com.sendmail.milter

Interface IMilterStatus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomMilterStatus, SimpleMilterStatus

    public interface IMilterStatus
    Status class for methods in IMilterHandler.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IMilterStatus SMFIS_ACCEPT
      Acceptance.
      static IMilterStatus SMFIS_CONTINUE
      Continue processing the current connection, message, or recipient.
      static IMilterStatus SMFIS_DISCARD
      Message discard.
      static IMilterStatus SMFIS_NOREPLY
      Do not send a reply back to the MTA.
      static IMilterStatus SMFIS_REJECT
      Rejection.
      static IMilterStatus SMFIS_SKIP
      Skip further body processing.
      static IMilterStatus SMFIS_TEMPFAIL
      Return a temporary failure, i.e., the corresponding SMTP command will return an appropriate 4xx status code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCode() 
      ByteBuffer getMessage() 

    • Field Detail

      • SMFIS_CONTINUE

        static final IMilterStatus SMFIS_CONTINUE
        Continue processing the current connection, message, or recipient.

      • SMFIS_REJECT

        static final IMilterStatus SMFIS_REJECT
        Rejection. For a connection-oriented routine, reject this connection; call close. For a message-oriented routine (except eom or abort), reject this message. For a recipient-oriented routine, reject the current recipient (but continue processing the current message).

      • SMFIS_DISCARD

        static final IMilterStatus SMFIS_DISCARD
        Message discard. For a message- or recipient-oriented routine, accept this message, but silently discard it. SMFIS_DISCARD should not be returned by a connection-oriented routine.

      • SMFIS_ACCEPT

        static final IMilterStatus SMFIS_ACCEPT
        Acceptance. For a connection-oriented routine, accept this connection without further filter processing; call close. For a message- or recipient-oriented routine, accept this message without further filtering.

      • SMFIS_SKIP

        static final IMilterStatus SMFIS_SKIP
        Skip further body processing. MTA should not send any more BODY chunks. Skip directly to End of Message processing.

      • SMFIS_TEMPFAIL

        static final IMilterStatus SMFIS_TEMPFAIL
        Return a temporary failure, i.e., the corresponding SMTP command will return an appropriate 4xx status code. For a message-oriented routine (except envfrom), fail for this message. For a connection-oriented routine, fail for this connection; call close. For a recipient-oriented routine, only fail for the current recipient; continue message processing.

      • SMFIS_NOREPLY

        static final IMilterStatus SMFIS_NOREPLY
        Do not send a reply back to the MTA. If you set the SMFIP_NR_* protocol action for a callback, that callback must always reply with SMFIS_NOREPLY. If the MTA does not support NOREPLY, send CONTINUE for backwards compatibility.

    • Method Detail

      • getCode

        int getCode()
        Returns:
        The response code. Must be one of MilterConstants#SMFIR_CONTINUE, MilterConstants#SMFIR_REJECT, MilterConstants#SMFIR_DISCARD, MilterConstants#SMFIR_ACCEPT, MilterConstants#SMFIR_TEMPFAIL, MilterConstants#SMFIR_REPLYCODE, unless you really, really know what you're doing.

      • getMessage

        ByteBuffer getMessage()
        Returns:
        null or a ByteBuffer containing an error/warning message.
